title: The original chart instance in report design handle is not modified after running the report.
OB: When running a report with a chart instance in the report design handle, the chart instance remains unchanged after the report is executed.
EB: The chart instance in the report design handle should be updated with the latest data and reflect any modifications made during the report execution.
SR:
1. Open the report design handle with a chart instance.
2. Make some modifications to the chart (e.g., change the data source, update the chart type).
3. Run the report.
4. Check if the chart instance in the report design handle reflects the changes made during the report execution.
